1.name: ARTICLE C. - PARADES, DEMONSTRATIONS AND STREET EVENTS
1.label: article

full_text:
(a) Any person violates the standards for the conduct of parades set out herein; or(b) Any participant in a parade fails to comply with the formation, terms and conditions set out in the application and permit or fails to comply with the terms of this section. 
(Code 1959 , §21-31(f))

CODE OF STATE

REVOCATION OF PERMIT. (§ 12-1054)

(a) Any person violates the standards for the conduct of parades set out herein;
or

(b) Any participant in a parade fails to comply with the formation, terms and
conditions set out in the application and permit or fails to comply with the
terms of this section. 
(Code 1959 , §21-31(f))
